lwdid
  • Changelog
  • View page source

Changelog

Version 0.1.0

Initial release

Features

  • Implementation of the Lee and Wooldridge (2025) DiD estimator

  • Four transformation methods: demean, detrend, demeanq, detrendq

  • Multiple variance estimators: homoskedastic, HC1, HC3, cluster-robust

  • Randomization inference

  • Period-specific treatment effects

  • Visualization and export capabilities
